'''Martial Artist's Red Flower''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Martial Artist]].

==Description==
Ever since being recognized by the master, the martial artist had been practicing every day for years.<br />The path of pursuing martial arts is long and harsh, and injuries are inevitable.<br />As instructed, he plucked a small crimson flower in the forest.<br />Although his proud battle scars will never fully heal, at least the pain can be alleviated.
